caption: Table 1: Expectation and variance of the maximum of n independent normal random variables.
description: This table shows the expectation and variance of the maximum of n independent standard normal random variables.  These values are used in the theoretical analysis of the watermark's robustness against attacks in Section 5 of the paper.  The expectation and variance are crucial for approximating the distribution of the test statistic and calculating the power of the robust watermark detection test.
